     May 11, 2023 
 
     KARNALYTE RESOURCES ANNOUNCES 2023 FIRST QUARTER RESULTS 
 
     Not for distribution to U.S. news wire services or dissemination in the United States. SASKATOON, SK (CNW- May 11, 2023) – Karnalyte Resources Inc. ("Karnalyte" or the "Company") (TSX: KRN) today announced its financial results and corporate highlights for the first quarter ended March 31, 2023.
